page.title: 08EVENTS:CHICKERELL FETE:FLEET
page.content: EVERY YEAR A{FETE}IS HELD AT A BIG HOUSE IN{CHICKERELL}CALLED '{THE ELMS} '.MANY PEOPLE FROM THE{FLEET}AREA ATTEND.ALL THE TAKINGS ARE PUT TOWARDS ST.MARYS CHURCH FUNDS.FOR ONE SATURDAY IN JULY{MR. and MRS.MILLS}(WHO LIVE AT {THE ELMS})KINDLY ALLOW THEIR LARGE GARDEN TO BE TAKEN OVER BY STALLS AND LARGE NUMBERS OF PEOPLE. '{THE ELMS}'IS SITUATED IN{EAST {STREET}WHICH IS THE SAME STREET AS THE {SCHOOL.}LOTS OF WOODEN TABLES ARE PLACED AROUND THE EDGE OF THE GARDEN LEAVING A SPACE FOR DISPLAYS.IN PREVIOUS YEARS THERE HAS BEEN COUNTRY DANCING BY THE CHILDREN FROM{ {CHICKERELL SCHOOL,MEDIEVAL DANCING}BY THE{FOLK DANCERS}FROM{DORCHESTER}AND DISPLAYS BY{CHICKERELL'S AMBERLIGHT {MAJORETTES}.THERE ARE ALSO A FEW STALLS TO AMUSE THE CHILDREN.
